metadata.title: CVE-2019-16927 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Xpdf 4.01.01 has an out-of-bounds write in the vertProfile part of the TextPage::findGaps function in TextOutputDev.cc, a different vulnerability than CVE-2019-9877.

notes.note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> poppler doesn't have TextPage::findGaps, no indication it is vulnerable to this issue

criterions.comment: ipe package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
xpdf package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
